name: jain-events-portal
description: A web portal for Jain University Events.

scripts.dev: pnpx concurrently -n "backend,clientview,adminview" "pnpm run start:backend" "pnpm run start:clientview" "pnpm run start:adminview"
scripts.setup: pnpx concurrently -n "backend,clientview,adminview" "pnpm run start:backend" "pnpm run start:clientview" "pnpm run start:adminview" "pnpm run init:backend" "pnpm run init:clientview" "pnpm run init:adminview"
scripts.update: pnpx concurrently -n "backend,clientview,adminview" "pnpm run start:backend" "pnpm run start:clientview" "pnpm run start:adminview" "pnpm run update:backend" "pnpm run update:clientview" "pnpm run update:adminview"
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && pnpm cache clean --force && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.clean:clientview: cd clientview && pnpm cache clean --force && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.clean:adminview: cd adminview && pnpm cache clean --force && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.clean: pnpx concurrently -n "backend,clientview,adminview" "pnpm run start:backend" "pnpm run start:clientview" "pnpm run start:adminview" "pnpm run clean:backend" "pnpm run clean:clientview" "pnpm run clean:adminview" && pnpm cache clean --force

author: Jery
